assignment3

Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment3.Vertex

  • public class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the vertices for each word with an adjacency list to other words
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Albert Bautista

    • Method Detail

      • checkAdjacency

        public java.lang.String checkAdjacency(Vertex word)
        This class compares and returns the string (Inefficient because of earlier implementation but it works)
        Parameters:
        word - Vertex to see if they are adjacent
        Returns:
        Returns a null if they aren't adjacent else returns the letters that are the same with an underscore at the different word

        public void setLowerWeight(int oWeight)
